hehe ;)

 --- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote: >
OOC- Not quite the power source, just a converter. 
> Also, Malice and Wolfblade are working on a back up
> plan in case the cannon fails.  BTW, when you need
> Malice for firing the real deal, get him and get him
> quick.  Unicron won't wait for him to connect with
> the cannon.  Just a friendly FYI. 
> 
> Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:OOC: Ok,
> here goes, from what I've been reading in the
> posts, Kup currently has Nighlight on test inside
> lab
> 5 in the base, 3 new warriors, Kitkat, Camoflage and
> Cooley, have joined the fray, along with Silverbolt,
> Black Arachnia, Rhinox and Primal. Wolfblade and
> Malice are working on a repulsion beam mod for the
> gun, with Malice as the power source. Bloodblade is
> a
> Minion, and the others are all working on the Uber
> Gun. Not sure what the Preds are upto.  Oh Yeah, and
> if the Maximals have alarms rigged on the Ark, they
> all went off, cause Shadowcaster just entered the
> Ark
> and Assimilated the matrix in an attempt to commune
> with Primus (read the posts Matrix Gambit and Matrix
> Quest, for more info on that).  Oh yeah, and there's
> a
> surprise in the works that noone will be expecting
> ;)
> hehehe.
>
